thread.title: 3 festivals next week in Florida
thread.title_full: 3 festivals next week in Florida | www.palmbeachpost.com

author: palmbeachpost
title: 3 festivals next week in Florida
text:
1. New Smyrna Beach
New Smyrna Beach Jazz Festival. Friday through Sunday; locations throughout the New Smyrna Beach area. Enjoy an all-jazz weekend while visiting some of the area’s music, restaurant and bar venues. Hear bands and artists from around the country, such as Harry Rios Trio, Monica da Silva, and Pat Gullotta and his Stompin’ Dixie Swampcats. 386-423-9760; nsbjazzfest.com
Trumpet 2. Pensacola
Pensacola Seafood Festival. Friday through Sunday; various venues. Sample seafood dishes and enjoy live entertainment (in Seville Square, Fountain Park and Bartram Park). There will be arts and crafts, a children’s area and The Fiesta Seafood Grille will offer cooking demonstrations. You can even participate in the 5K walk/run on Saturday morning. 850-433-6512; fiestaoffiveflags.org
3. Fort Myers Beach
National Public Lands Day Scavenger Hunt. Saturday; check-in begins at 8:30 a.m. Lovers Key State Park. Grab your friends, create a team (six members or less) and explore a great park as you follow clues and snap photos. Participants will discover hidden gems of the park, as well as complete tasks along the route that make a positive impact on the environment. Bring a camera or a smart-phone that has one. Preregistration required; call 239-463-4588. 8700 Estero Blvd. floridastateparks.org
</span
